actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: Regarding the payment of interest with respect to certain reliquidated entries.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay interest, using a specified formula, on the aggregate amount of the duties that were paid with respect to entries of certain tubular tin products reliquidated on November 14, 1988, under the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988.

titles.title: Regarding the payment of interest with respect to certain reliquidated entries.
